General.Name: NOVATECH Co. Ltd
General.Description: Novatech Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the design, manufacture, and sale of magnet and magnet applications in South Korea. The company also provides magnet plates used as protective cover for various IT devices. Its products are primarily used in vehicle, wireless chargers, and household appliances applications. The company was formerly known as MPlus Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Novatech Co., Ltd. in March 2018. Novatech Co., Ltd. was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
